original_text: After I am no longer with you, I want you still to remember what I have told you. So I will make sure that you have something to help you not to forget.
korean_text: 내가 힘써 너희로 하여금 내가 떠난 후에라도 어느 때나 이런 것을 생각나게 하려 하노라

sentences.original_text: After I am no longer with you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 더 이상 너희와 함께 있지 않은 후에

sentences.original_text: I want you still to remember
to help you not to forget
